'M']['Interferon beta-la', 'MESTRE-MS Study', "EMR200136_59'", 'Is currently treated with Rebif, using RebiSmart 2.0 for a maximum of 6 months prior to', 'Visit 1', 'Has a score on the Expanded planned surgical procedures at the time of the informed consent that will prevent', 'adherence to treatment with Rebif through RebiSmart 2.0', 'Is diagnosed with primary progressive, secondary
